name: Show the Way
description:
Show the way  is a puzzle platformerforcing you to plan for the future when deciding your next movements.

Story

You have been put in charge of controlling the RB-20, an advanced robot sent out to explore unfamiliar terrain. You can control the robot's left and right movements and even when it jumps. The issue however is that you can only reliably send 4 seconds of movement data to the robot. Once it gets to the end it rewinds and starts again. This means that when moving you must take into account that your movements get repeated every 4 seconds.

Controls

In recording mode:

            A/D or Arrow Keys to record left or right movement.

            Z or space to jump

When you've finished recording the four seconds of movement:

            R to reset the level

            X to begin the robot's movement

Credits

Music: Electric Exodus v0.2 by FoxSynergy (https://opengameart.org/content/electric-exodus) (Slight modifications made to allow for looping)

Platforms

Windows 7 or higher is required to run this game.
